data.title: Building What Matters
data.meta_description: Support the Y's commitment to building a healthier downtown Kansas City through a donation. Major donors will be recognized in the facility,.
data.text:
BETTER BEGINS HERE

The historic Lyric Theater has been transformed into a new state-of-the-art Y, focused on supporting a more vibrant downtown core and providing life-strengthening programs for all ages. The center will open to the community on October 11, followed by a ribbon cutting celebration on October 14.

The new Y builds on the success of Kansas Cityâ€™s downtown revitalization and will fill gaps in community services to benefit generations for years to come. We are grateful to our donors and partners for their support to make this project possible.

Be a Part of History

Because of you, our common vision of a healthier downtown community will become a reality. Every dollar raised for the Kirk Family YMCA will have a lasting impact on the people of Kansas City.

Support the Downtown Y

Careers

At The Y

As the leading nonprofit for youth development, healthy living and social responsibility, the Y is looking for talented associates to help us make our community stronger. We'll begin hiring for the Kirk Family YMCA in the coming months. In the meantime, we have positions available at locations throughout the metro.
